description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. Favorite slots games from LiveGLBT.com are now available to everyone. Each with it’s own mini-game. Cocktail slots has exciting three real slot action like in a casino. Bright colorful graphics, high quality sound! Take a trip under the sea in Fish Slots. Ride'm Cowboys and Cowgals! Mosey on over to Rodeo Slots and take a spin. A great western themed game with a cattle roping mini-game.
